description: Nestled between splendid beaches and bays, this restaurant focuses on the sea, not only in its views but also in its cuisine. The owner takes centre stage in the dining room, while the dishes prepared in the kitchen are varied, generous in size and reasonably priced, featuring classic recipes which allow the full flavours of the top-quality fish to shine through.
